Title: Hissatsu Chikan Nin
Description: ['One day, when Koichi was on a crowded train, a girl in front of him suddenly cried out, "He\'s a train molester!" "What!? No, I didn\'t do that!" He was mistakenly arrested for train molestation. Two years later, Koichi is now on a train to take revenge on that girl, "I\'ll do it...."']
